heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 7 | 17 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This theorem predicts an average kinetic energy of three-halves k T for every particle in a monatomic ideal gas. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this stat mech theorem which states that the mean energy is spread equally over all degrees of freedom.
